alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 4:46AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...LOCALIZED DENSE FOG AROUND CHEYENNE EARLY THIS MORNING... Fog has developed early this morning around the Cheyenne area with visibilities reduced down to one quarter mile at times. This area of fog is expected to linger through sunrise, mainly between Mile Markers 350 and 375 along Interstate 80, and between the Colorado border and Mile Marker 20 along Interstate 25. Motorists are urged to use caution while traveling across far southeast Wyoming early this morning. Allow plenty of distance between you and the vehicle in front of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
